EmailTemplate.name: Sept6Web: LeadGen.Invite 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Webinar For Expert Tips On Securing Clients
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
For independent consultants, it’s hard to find new sources of revenue in a tough economy. That’s why MBO Partners is presenting a new topic in our 2012 Webinar Series on Thursday, September 6 at 1pm EST called The Consultant's Guide to Lead Generation: Three Steps to Securing New Clients <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept6Webinar-LeadGen.html>.
In this webinar, you’ll gain insights from our guest expert Bret Smith <http://info.mbopartners.com/MeetTheIndependentsNY.html>, founder of High Impact Prospecting, LLC. After 25 years of success in sales and marketing, Bret has developed strategies to help you locate and message your target audience.
You will walk away with three tangible, easy steps to generate leads:
1. Research target audience
2. Acquire contact information
3. Communicate with targeted messages
Expand your network by registering today <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept6Webinar-LeadGen.html>.
__________________________________
The MBO Marketing Team t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com
